Joerg Arndt, Matters Computational (The Fxtbook), section 39.10, pp. 786-792
Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Strong Pseudoprime
mathematica: sppQ[n_?EvenQ, _] := False; sppQ[n_?PrimeQ, _] := False; sppQ[n_, b_] := (s = IntegerExponent[n-1, 2]; d = (n-1)/2^s; If[PowerMod[b, d, n] == 1, Return[True], Do[If[PowerMod[b, d*2^r, n] == n-1, Return[True]], {r, 0, s-1}]]); A020229 = {}; lst = {}; k = 3; While[k < 500000, If[sppQ[k, 3], Print[k]; AppendTo[lst, k]]; k += 2]; lst (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 20 2011, after R. J. Mathar *)
prog: (PARI) is_A020229(n,b=3)={ bittest(n,0)|return;ispseudoprime(n)&return;my(d=(n-1)>>valuation(n-1,2));Mod(b,n)^d==1 || until(n-1<=d*=2,Mod(b,n)^d+1 || return(1))}  \\  - _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 19 2012
author: _David W. Wilson_
